Class ActivityList

java.lang.Object
ActivityList
public class ActivityList
extends java.lang.Object
The ActivityList Class is the Model of the Carbon Impact Application Program that processes a list of activity objects and operates on them using various methods to update/add/remove the methods.
Since:
18/03/2020
Author:
Justas Cepaitis * @version 1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) java.util.ArrayList<Activity> activityList
    The activity list.

    Constructor Description
    ActivityList()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Activity> getActivities()
    This method returns an ArrayList containing activity objects.
    java.lang.String getActivitiesByActivity()
    This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their names and separated by a \n.
    java.lang.String getActivitiesByDate()
    This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their dates and separated by a \n.
    java.lang.String getActivitiesText()
    This method returns a string of activities from activityList separated by a \n.
    Activity getActivity​(int week, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name, int points)
    This method returns an activity corresponding to the parameters passed to the method by constructing a new activity out of the parameters.
    Activity getActivityByIndex​(int index)
    This method returns the activity at the specified index.
    int getTotalPoints​(int week)
    This method returns the total points of a week of activities in the activityList.
    int getTotalPointsOfAllWeeks()
    This method returns the sum of all points of all activities in the activityList.
    void removeActivity​(int Week, java.time.LocalDate Date, java.lang.String Name, int Points)
    This method searches through the array activityList removes an activity from activityList which corresponds to the parameters passed.
    void setActivitiesFromFile​(java.util.ArrayList<Activity> importedActivityList)
    This method sets the list of activities to the contents of the ArrayList received as a parameter.
    void setActivity​(int week, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name, int points)
    This method creates a new activity using the parameters passed to it and adds the activity passed to it to the ArrayList activityList.

      public ActivityList()

  • Method Details

    • setActivity

      public void setActivity​(int week, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name, int points)
      This method creates a new activity using the parameters passed to it and adds the activity passed to it to the ArrayList activityList.
      Parameters:
      week - . Week of activity
      date - . Date of activity
      name - . Name of activity
      points - . Points of activity

    • getActivity

      public Activity getActivity​(int week, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name, int points)
      This method returns an activity corresponding to the parameters passed to the method by constructing a new activity out of the parameters.
      Parameters:
      week - . Week of activity
      date - . Date of activity
      name - . Name of activity
      points - . Points of activity
      Returns:
      Activity. The activity corresponding to the parameters passed.

    • setActivitiesFromFile

      public void setActivitiesFromFile​(java.util.ArrayList<Activity> importedActivityList)
      This method sets the list of activities to the contents of the ArrayList received as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      importedActivityList - . ArrayList of activities.

    • getActivityByIndex

      public Activity getActivityByIndex​(int index)
      This method returns the activity at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - of the activity desired
      Returns:
      Activity corresponding to index

    • getActivitiesByDate

      public java.lang.String getActivitiesByDate()
      This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their dates and separated by a \n.
      Returns:
      String. The activities in String form separated by \n and sorted by their dates

    • getTotalPointsOfAllWeeks

      public int getTotalPointsOfAllWeeks()
      This method returns the sum of all points of all activities in the activityList.
      Returns:
      Int. The total points of all weeks

    • getActivitiesByActivity

      public java.lang.String getActivitiesByActivity()
      This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their names and separated by a \n.
      Returns:
      String. The activities in String form separated by \n and sorted by their names

    • removeActivity

      public void removeActivity​(int Week, java.time.LocalDate Date, java.lang.String Name, int Points)
      This method searches through the array activityList removes an activity from activityList which corresponds to the parameters passed.
      Parameters:
      Week - . Week of activity
      Date - . Date of activity
      Name - . Name of activity
      Points - . Points of activity

    • getActivitiesText

      public java.lang.String getActivitiesText()
      This method returns a string of activities from activityList separated by a \n.
      Returns:
      String. The activities in String form separated by \n

    • getActivities

      public java.util.ArrayList<Activity> getActivities()
      This method returns an ArrayList containing activity objects.
      Returns:
      ArrayList. The list of activities.

    • getTotalPoints

      public int getTotalPoints​(int week)
      This method returns the total points of a week of activities in the activityList.
      Parameters:
      week - of activities to have their total points returned
      Returns:
      Int. The added up points of the week of activities
